Working with some Indian clients can be challenging at times. Worked with a client with numerous changes to a Next.js application on short notice and with limited budget. Thankfully, I've completed the project and received payment, but it was indeed a headache dealing with unrealistic expectations.Moving forward, I'll focus on my major $3000 project. If the client permits, I'll share updates on the work. I'm also looking to onboard more projects.hashtag#freelance hashtag#money hashtag#reactnative hashtag#buildinpublic hashtag#java hashtag#fullstack hashtag#MobileAppDevelopment hashtag#remote
